snippet.title: Game Boy Color Longplay [010] Shantae
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played By: ScHlAuChi

The game starts abit slow, but gets really awesome later on - a hidden gem in the GBC library :)

WayForward has released a sequel to this game on DSiWare called Shantae - Risky´s Revenge - check it out :)
http://riskysrevenge.shantae.com/

There is also a sequel to Risky´s Revenge coming to the 3DS Store :) -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
